problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦,如果弧AC=弧AD,∠C比∠D大36°,则∠A等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O and CD is the chord. If arc AC = arc AD, ∠C is larger than ∠D by N_0, then ∠A is equal to ()
raw_answer: ∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦,如果\hat{AC}=\hat{AD}∴AB⊥CD,∴∠B+∠D=90°,∠A+∠C=90°∵∠B与∠C都对\hat{AD}∴∠C=∠B,∴∠C+∠D=90°,∵∠C-∠D=36°∴∠C=63°,∠D=27°,则∠A=27°.故选:B.
raw_comment: 考查了圆周角定理,垂径定理,熟练掌握圆周角定理是解本题的关键.
